```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load libraries
```{r}
library(readr)
library(data.table)
library(tm)
library(quanteda)
library(readtext)
```

Read in data
```{r}
myURL <- "https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/dsscapstone/dataset/Coursera-SwiftKey.zip"
 
dateDownloaded <- date()
 
 if(!file.exists("rawdata.zip")){
     download.file(myURL, destfile = "rawdata.zip", method = "curl")
     unzip("rawdata.zip")
}
```

Read in data
```{r}
en_corp <- corpus(readtext("~/CapstoneProject/final/en_US"))
de_corp <- corpus(readtext("~/CapstoneProject/final/de_DE"))
fi_corp <- corpus(readtext("~/CapstoneProject/final/fi_FI"))
ru_corp <- corpus(readtext("~/CapstoneProject/final/ru_RU"))

corp <- en_corp + de_corp + fi_corp + ru_corp
rm(en_corp, de_corp, fi_corp, ru_corp)
```
